趜字的基本解释

趜
jú
穷。
体不伸。

趜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jú］
［《廣韻》居六切，入屋，見。］
(1)穷，困厄。
(2)身体躬曲不伸。
[②]［qū］
［《集韻》丘六切，入屋，溪。］
恭敬。
[③]［qiú］
［《集韻》渠尤切，平尤，羣。］
足不伸。

趜字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【走字部】　趜； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1218第09
【廣韻】【集韻】?渠竹切，音鞠。【說文】窮也。【類篇】一曰趜?，足不伸。　又【集韻】居六切，音掬。義同。　又【廣韻】渠竹切【集韻】丘六切，?音鞠。匑或作趜。謹敬也。　又【集韻】渠尤切，音求。【類篇】?或作趜。詳?字註。

趜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
趜字的起名意思

暂无。

Hu
Basic explanation of words
Hu
jú
poor.
The body does not stretch.
Hu
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jú］
["Guangyun" lives in six cuts, enter the house, see you. ]
(1) Poor and distressed.
(2) The body is bowed and not stretched.
[②]［qū］
["Jiyun" Qiu has six cuts, enters the house, and streams. ]
Respectfully.
[③]［qiú］
["Jiyun" Qu Youqie, Pingyou, Qun. ]
The feet are not stretched.
Hu
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Zhou Zi Department] 　趜; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1218 09
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Qu Zhu cut, sound Ju. [Said Wen] Poor. 【Classes】One said 趜? The foot does not stretch.　 [Ji Yun] Six cuts, sound. The same meaning.　 [Guang Yun] Qu Zhu cut [Ji Yun] Qiu Liu cut,? Yin Ju.匑 or 趜. Sincerely too.　[Jiyun] Qu Youqie, the sound is seeking. 【Classes】? Or make a fool. Detailed? Note.
